install.name: ofxStringEncoders
install.author: Diederick Huijbers
install.description:
Very early state. Note that you need to run: $ ./configure && make at least once to create the config.h file. Copy this file to the src/lib/stringencoder directory. Only tested on mac.
../../../addons_diederick/ofxStringEncoders/src/ ../../../addons_diederick/ofxStringEncoders/src/lib/stringencoders/
